meanings.definition: Atheroscleroses: a disease of the arteries characterized by the deposition of plaques of fatty material on their inner walls.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that atheroscleroses can lead to heart problems.
meanings.sent2: My grandfather has been diagnosed with atheroscleroses in his arteries.
meanings.sent3: Even though it sounds like a fancy term, atheroscleroses are just fatty deposits in the arteries.
meanings.sent4: The city's traffic congestion was compared to atheroscleroses clogging up the roads.
meanings.sent5: The image of atheroscleroses blocking the flow of blood stuck in my mind.
